Power Strip with Built-in Surge Protection: This power strip would have built-in surge protection to protect electronics from power surges caused by lightning strikes or other electrical disturbances.

Smart Power Strip: A smart power strip that can be controlled through a smartphone app or voice commands. It would allow users to turn off individual outlets or entire strips of outlets remotely, saving energy and reducing the risk of overloading circuits.
Eco-Friendly Power Strip: A power strip made from sustainable materials like bamboo or recycled plastic. It would not only be environmentally friendly but also stylish and durable.

Multi-USB Power Strip: A power strip with multiple USB ports for charging smartphones, tablets, and other electronic devices simultaneously. It would save time and reduce the need for multiple chargers.

Customizable Power Strip: A power strip with customizable outlets that can be configured to fit different types of plugs and devices. It would provide flexibility and convenience for users who have a variety of electronic devices.
